resources.string:
\ - You must enter 'Category' at least
 - Typing in a distance will cause the 'CO2' field to update in real time
 - CO2 is calculated by multiplying the distance by the specific factor for each vehicle type
 - This factor assumes a typical number of passengers for that particular vehicle
 - Press 'Done' when you are finished entering information
\ - Tap \'Delete\' the trip\n - Tap \'Edit\' to edit its information
